thread.section_title: BEST WESTERN Hotel Ohm by HappyCulture - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Clean, friendly and quiet!
thread.title_full: Clean, friendly and quiet! - Review of BEST WESTERN Hotel Ohm by HappyCulture, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Tessa_19_12
title: Clean, friendly and quiet!
text:
Me and my partner stayed here for 3 nights from 2nd February 2017 and both loved it. Staff were very friendly and helpful, especially Charlotte who helped us find places to eat every night which suited our taste. The room was clean, comfortable and quiet and had a projector instead of a tv which my partner was very happy with...very modern! We were both surprised it was only a 3 star. The room was cleaned daily and always looked immaculate.
The hotel is situated in a quiet part of Paris with small restaurants nearby, however, is just a half hour walk to the busier, more touristic part of the city where the Eiffel Tower and Louvre etc are located. There is also a bus stop right outside the hotel taking you right outside the touristic places in about 10 minutes. There are a number of supermarkets nearby too if any essentials are required.
Neither of us ate the food from the hotel but there was a breakfast buffet every morning for â‚¬5 which looked good! There was also a happy hour every evening from 18:00-20:00 which included wine and cheeses which was great!
We would definitely recommend this hotel and would 100% stay here again!
